segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a contrast to the chaos happening inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is open, letting in fresh air and sunlight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the path and the little bushes lining it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fence in the background looks sturdy and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like two different worlds—the calm outside and the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the kitchen could be as tidy as the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light coming through the window makes everything look so bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet it’s a nice day outside, but no one in here seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are tied back neatly, letting in all that light.
segments.speaker: PAR
